/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, a main artery of the city, is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, offering a comprehensive view of the city's daily life.
